data.title: Music - Discography, Singles, Unreleased, Bootlegs
data.meta_description: Barbra Archives details all of Streisand's music with links on this main page, including her complete official discography, and special pages about unreleased albums, songs, and more.  Also a link to her singles.
data.text:
Stars for Jerusalem (Columbia Special Products, Canada, 1973) — “People” (live, Central Park, without vocal intro)

Neil Diamond — You Don't Bring Me Flowers (Columbia, 1978) — “You Don't Bring Me Flowers” (duet) [buy]

Broadway Magic — Volume 2: The Great Performers (Columbia, 1980) — “Miss Marmelstein” [LP only]

Defending Your Life (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack) (1991) — “Something's Coming” [buy]

For Our Children (Walt Disney Records, 1991) — “A Child is Born” [buy]

Andrew Lloyd Webber: The Premiere Collection Encore (1993 Polydor) — “Memory” [Disc 2] [buy]

Michael Crawford - A Touch of Music in the Night (Atlantic, 1993) — “Music of the Night” duet [buy]

Diana - Princess Of Wales Tribute (Sony, 1997) — “Evergreen” [Disc 1] [buy]

Celine Dion - Let's Talk About Love (Sony, 1997) — “Tell Him” duet [buy]

Warner Bros.' 75 Years Of Film Music (June 2, 1998, Rhino) — “Evergreen” [Disc 3] [buy]

Ultimate Broadway (June 30, 1998, Arista) — “People” [Broadway version; Disc 3] [buy]

Judy (October 13, 1998, 32 Records) — “Get Happy”/“Happy Days Are Here Again” duet w/ Judy Garland [buy]

The King And I Original Animated Feature Soundtrack (Sony Classical SK 63386, 1999) — “I Have Dreamed / We Kiss In A Shadow / Something Wonderful” [buy]

The All Time Greatest Movie Songs (Sony EK 69879, 1999) — Bryan Adams duet “I Finally Found Someone” [buy]

Sony Music 100 Years: Soundtrack For A Century (Sony JXK 65750, 1999) — 26-CD box set with five previously released Streisand tracks in the set: "People" [1964; Pop Music: The Golden Era 1951-1975 (#J2K 65791)], "The Way We Were" (1974) & "Evergreen" (1976) [Movie Music: The Definitive Performances (#J2K 65813)], "Beau Soir" [1976; Sony Classical: Great Performances 1903-1998 (#J4K 65819)], and "Guilty" [1980; Pop Music: The Modern Era 1976-1999 (#J2K 65794)]. [buy]

Andrew Lloyd Webber: Gold: The Definitive Hits Collection (2002, Decca) — “As If We Never Said Goodbye” [buy]

God Bless America (2002, HarperCollins hardcover illustrated book) — “God Bless America” [ buy ]

It's Still Okay To Dream: Save The Children (November 18, 2003, Atlantic Records) — “I Believe/You’ll Never Walk Alone" [buy]

Music From The Motion Picture Mona Lisa Smile (November 25, 2003, Epic/Sony) — “Smile” [buy]

Broadway - The American Musical (2004, Sony) — “People” [Broadway version; Disc 3] [buy]

Kenny G —At Last...The Duets Album (Arista, 2004) — "The Music That Makes Me Dance" [buy]

Hurricane Relief — Come Together Now (RIAA, 2005) — “I Believe” [single version]

A Place For Us: A Tribute to 50 Years of West Side Story (Columbia Masterworks, 2007) — “I Have A Love / One Hand One Heart” duet with Mathis. [buy]

Barry Manilow Duets (May 3, 2011, Sony) — “I Won't Be the One to Let Go” (duet with Manilow) [buy]

Jackie Evancho Dream With Me (June 14, 2011, Sony) — “Somewhere” (duet with Evancho) [buy]

Jackie Evancho Dream With Me in Concert (October 4, 2011, Columbia) — “Somewhere” (duet music video with Evancho) [buy Blu-ray] [buy DVD]

Prima Divas (March 4, 2014, Music Digital) —“Lover, Come Back To Me,” “Miss Marmelstein,” “Happy Days,”“My Colouring Book,” “When the Sun Comes Out” [buy]

Tony Bennett The Classics — “Smile” (Duet with Tony Bennet). Vinyl exclusive at Barnes & Noble. [buy]

Johnny Mercer - The Dream's on Me (2016, Watertower Mod) — “My Shining Hour” (Live, from 2006 concert) [buy]

Unmasked: The Platinum Collection (Verve, 2018) — “With One Look” [https://amzn.to/2GXyra6]

The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel: Season 1 [Music From The Prime Original Series] (Hip-O, 2019) — “Come To The Supermarket (In Old Peking)” [https://amzn.to/3gKJLTW]

The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel: Season 3 [Music From The Prime Original Series] (Hip-O, 2019) — “Just Leave Everything To Me (Hello, Dolly!)” and “Happy Days Are Here Again” [https://amzn.to/2Bhqnh7]
